Opacity of the watermark (1.0 to 0.0 with 1 being completely visible and 0 being invisible)

Transparent color used in watermark image, set to null if not used
member.returns: The results in the form of a bitmap object

Name of the file to save the screenshot (optional)
member.returns: Returns a bitmap containing the screen shot
